GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v6.1.9
GSD.description:
netrom: Fix use-after-free of a listening socket.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.9 by commit 51e394c6f81adbfe7c34d15f58b3d4d44f144acf, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 517a16b1a88bdb6b530f48d5d153478b2552d9a8. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: netrom: Fix use-after-free of a listening socket.
